thread.title: At Last- A New York Hotel I Didn't End of Hating
thread.title_full: At Last- A New York Hotel I Didn't End of Hating - Review of The Time New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Marc B
title: At Last- A New York Hotel I Didn't End of Hating
text:
The hotel is quite new and decorated in the "latest trend" modern style. But that was less important to me than the fact that the rooms are spotlessly clean and did not have wall to wall carpeting (very important, as my wife is allergic to dust) and the bedding is feather-free. Also, the staff was very welcoming, especially with street directions, getting us a drink when the bar was hosting a private party, and other small but meaningful "go the extra mile" services. The room was relatively large by New York hotel standards. Add to all this a great location, and we will be returning soon.
Room Tip: Although our room faced the street, it was completely quiet. See more room tips
